text.jpText:
いつ見ても、この学園は広大ですわね。
まるで実家のお屋敷みたい……。
text.enText:
This school's so vast, no matter how 
many times I see it. It's like our mansion 
back home.

text.jpText:
幼い頃はよく迷子になって、
慌てたじいやに迎えに来て頂いたものです。
text.enText:
I used to get lost there a lot when I was 
young, and our butler would come looking 
for me in a panic.

text.jpText:
見かねたおばあ様が、廊下に目印の
ぬいぐるみをたくさん置いてくれて――
text.enText:
And my grandmother, who couldn't stand 
to see me getting lost, put lots of stuffed toys  in the hallway as a guide...

text.jpText:
……って、コホン！
今のは聞かなかったことにしてくださいまし。
text.enText:
……A-Ahem! Please pretend you didn't 
hear that.
